summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Ordinance 100282 relating to bingo, raffle and amusement games exempted from the criminal penalties of state law by Chapter 280, Laws of 1971, 1st Extraordinary Session, as amended, to provide certain additional restrictions on the conduct of such games, to impose a quarterly limitation on receipts, and to increase the fee paid in connection with declarations of intent and financial statements filed pursuant thereto.
